item.title: blogdown-comment-font
item.description: .hljs-comment{ font-family: Microsoft YaHei ; font-style: normal; } 加载包 library(dplyr) ## ## 载入程辑包：'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union # 添加中文注释
